headline: Skyworks Showcases Intelligent Connectivity Innovations at CES 2026
summary: Company to Unveil Edge-IoT, Automotive, Audio, and Gaming SolutionsLAS VEGAS, Jan. 06, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Skyworks Solutions, Inc. (Nasdaq: SWKS) introduced the SKY66424-11, the industry’s first highly integrated Wi-SUN®/LoRaWAN® RF front-end modules (FEM) designed for smart home and smart city applications today at CES 2026. Compared to other discrete solutions - consisting of an LNA, Switch, Filter and interstage matching - the SKY66424-11 combines advanced SAW or acoustic filtering, amp

headline: Semiconductors Winners And Losers At The Start Of 2026
summary: Semiconductor stocks enter 2026 with AI tailwinds but rising risks, narrow leadership, and Fed policy threats. Read here for more analysis.
